ComicInfo.Penciller: Dan Brereton,Chynna Clugston-Major,Shane Oakley,Vince Roucher,Chynna Clugston-Major,Shane Oakley,Vince Roucher,Dan Brereton
ComicInfo.Summary: This issue: It's the final chapter of The Nocturnals, Dan Brereton's creepy horror serial, Stan and Vince's "Metalfer" continues, as Dr. Jones runs for his life from giant robots, evil mercenaries, and ruthless corporate fat cats, and Shane Oakley begins "Stiltskin," the story of a young boy with a horrible deformity but a terrific imagination. Growing up, he shows the bullies what he's made of. Yet, evil forces loom . . .
ComicInfo.Title: How To Talk Shite, The Irish Way; Sticks and Stones; Manhunt
ComicInfo.Writer: Chynna Clugston-Major,Shane Oakley,Stan Manoukian,Benoit Grenier,Dan Brereton,Chynna Clugston-Major,Shane Oakley,Stan Manoukian,Benoit Grenier,Dan Brereton
